author: spencerusa
title: One Of The Best Hotels In Asia
text:
Certainly the leading Hotel in Beijing with an ambience and attention to detail and service that goes beyond even the best Shangri-La.
I suggest you upgrade to the ManorClub which gives access to the expansive seventh floor lounge and many other substantive amenities including breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails.
The hotel decor presents a successful blend of contemporary and traditional Asian styles. It is comfortable yet distinctive without being opulent.
Large yet thoroughly furnished bedrooms with excellent attention to detail, both aesthetic and technical. High quality artifacts, wall paintings and art books add personality and substance to traditional yet contemporary furnishings. Walk-in shower, double bath, hi tech toilet etc. very good lighting and window shade systems.
The entire seventh floor is devoted to the spa, gym and large, distinctive pool with a glass roof open to natural light. Gym is 24 hours, pool for 17.
Many restaurant options, food quality excellent, especially recommend Country Kitchen on third floor.
